data:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
Location: https://www.destakjornal.com.br/
Server: Microsoft-IIS/10.0
Date: Fri, 19 Apr 2019 07:20:45 GMT
Content-Length: 0

CVE-2019-9024.summary: An issue was discovered in PHP before 5.6.40, 7.x before 7.1.26, 7.2.x before 7.2.14, and 7.3.x before 7.3.1. xmlrpc_decode() can allow a hostile XMLRPC server to cause PHP to read memory outside of allocated areas in base64_decode_xmlrpc in ext/xmlrpc/libxmlrpc/base64.c.

CVE-2019-11035.summary: When processing certain files, PHP EXIF extension in versions 7.1.x below 7.2.8, 7.2.x below 7.2.17 and 7.3.x below 7.3.4 can be caused to read past allocated buffer in exif_iif_add_value function. This may lead to information disclosure or crash.

CVE-2019-11034.summary: When processing certain files, PHP EXIF extension in versions 7.1.x below 7.2.8, 7.2.x below 7.2.17 and 7.3.x below 7.3.4 can be caused to read past allocated buffer in exif_process_IFD_TAG function. This may lead to information disclosure or crash.

http.title: Internet Video Archive | Movie, TV Show, Game Data

Play Video

Easily build best-in-class content discovery experiences by using IVA's metadata, images, trailers, TV listings and more.

Need Data About Movies, TV Shows, Games and Celebrities?

A Trusted Source For Entertainment

With over 15 years experience working with clients from all walks of the content ecosystem, Internet Video Archive (IVA) has built its reputation as a leading vendor to the industry.  Top cable companies, publishers, retailers, theatre operators and start-ups rely on IVA’s solutions and underlying APIs to help their viewers find the movies, TV shows, video games and celebrities they care about.

"IVA provides an easy and flexible solution to integrate data, high quality trailers and images.The IVA API-based services are fit for integration with the Spideo cutting edge Personalization and Discovery technology. IVA also provides a very helpful support service when needed"

Thibault d'Orso, Founder - Spideo (2018)

Entertainment Data Curated for Your Business

IVA is the affordable solution to building great entertainment experiences fast!  With 30% more coverage than other providers, we provide the best value.  Our solutions are tailored to the specific needs of clients throughout each stage of the release cycle.  We help you access the content that will engage YOUR viewers and grow YOUR business the most!

Select Your Business

Get detailed information about the entertainment data solutions IVA offers for you

Theatre Operators

Retailers/OTT/Portals

Publishers

Pay TV Operators

Embrace the Video Age

Video is now essential to any content discovery experience.  IVA offers access to the LARGEST collection of trailers and clips for movies, TV and video games that can be displayed in the video player of your choice and on any device.  Add thousands of videos to your site or service without the hassle of encoding, storage, delivery or security.  With video included in all entertainment data solutions, ramp up your video strategy in short order.  Developers can test by signing up for a FREE TRIAL.

"Years of testing has made it clear that video previews help our members browse less and discover new content more quickly"

Cameron Johnson, Director of Product Innovation - Netflix (2018)

Expert Support

IVA is fully dedicated to our clients’ success.  We take a consultative approach to each relationship to ensure you get the most from our products and services.  We offer detailed documentation, code examples, SDKs and access to our support staff so you can accelerate your time to market.  Visit our developer portal for technical details and to see how our APIs help you access the content your users are looking for.

Request a Demo

Let our team personally walk you through our solutions, discuss your needs and the ways IVA can help you achieve a next generation content discovery experience.
Sign Up for Demo

Phone: +1 856 310 1981
Fax: +1 856 310 1956
E-mail Us: support@internetvideoarchive.com
